Name: José Fausto
description:
José went to school until the seventh form. He is married and has seven children, three of whom still go to school, while the others already work.
His wife sells fruit and vegetables.
José has been in that same trade for over ten years. A family member taught him.
He also grows basic grains such as maize and broad beans.
He sells fruit and vegetables door-to-door. He works every day with the help of his wife and children.
He needs the loan to buy more fruit and vegetables to sell as well as to buy manure for his crops.
He dreams of increasing his income, for his family’s sake. He aims at expanding his business and saving in order to help his children carve out a better life for themselves.
